collection.name: You Must Be Happy.
collection.openText: Many of those who underwent an operation inside the machinery have found rest and became healthy again.

specialTipSize.specialTip: An employee using the machinery will have all their abilities increased.
The longer the employee uses it, the higher the value of the rising ability
Be sure to stop the machinery only when the machine indicates Yes displayed at the top.If stopped using in NO state, all status will drop as much as they increased.
Increased status will return to normal in the next day. However, employese who’ve gained more than a 200 status increase due to the target’s influence vanish the next day.
<Warning> In the case an employee uses the target more than n times, exploding at the spot has been confirmed.
